A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Great visuals and some awesome scenes. Good acting of Daisy Ridley\, Adam Driver and Mark Hamill. But there are too many plot holes for a modern movie\, even for a Sci-Fi-Fantasy mix. And Rian Johnson changed some charactars way too much\, especially Luke Skywalker. Additionally I didn't like that Johnson dropped most of open threads JJ Abrams handed over to him at the end of Episode 7. Last but not least: Too many bad slapstick gags. I was hoping for a more adult movie like Rogue One.
